product_name: Seattle Sports Dry Doc Laptop Case - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Seattle Sports Dry Doc laptop case protects your laptop, tablet or other similarly sized valuables with a PVC-free, puncture-resistant film and a waterproof, resealable closure.
short_description: The Seattle Sports Dry Doc laptop case protects your laptop, tablet or other similarly sized valuables with a PVC-free, puncture-resistant film and a waterproof, resealable closure.
